description:
Planet of the Pinyari
A drifting spacecraft lands on some planet and the hatch opens. What comes out from it is the Pinyari! The Pinyari sets off to explore the mysterious planet, but...
Mugi Gets Angry
Mugi, the mom of 5 boys, stumbles into Mom`s place. She says today is the day that she got too tired looking after them. After resting at Mom`s place, she and Mom head off to Mugi`s place...
Commugi`s Counterattack
Mom had no choice but to look after the Mugi Five to let Mugi rest for a day. But with Bunji and five boys, the boys powers exceed Mom`s expectations...
Summer Vacation
You got the blues from hearing the words "summer vacation"! It`s you isn`t it, Mom? According to Mom`s stories, it`s scary "summer vacation" for her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Planet of the Pinyari / Mugi Gets Angry / Mugi`s Counterattack / Summer Vacation
ぴにゃりの惑星 / 麦ちゃん怒る / 麦ちゃんの逆襲 / 夏休み
